venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
You know that it's better to stay positive, "connected", calm and peaceful; yet stress, worry and negative emotional reactions happen anyway!  Does this happen to you?

How do you create internal "drama", stress and emotional upsets? You know those "Woe is me..." or "I can't stand this.." and other similar feelings and thoughts.

This will be the topic of this month's meetup. We'll discuss how you create stressful emotions and reactions to the dramas in your life, and how you can prevent them . We'll be covering ideas that are different than the usual "use positive language and focus on positives", and leading you through some experiential exercises to learn how you can easily do this on your own in the future.

Hope you'll join us to add some more strategies to your repertoire for leading a joyful, easy life!

Thank you so much to those of you who have RSVP'd "yes" and showed up! Help us reach our goal of 100% attendance for those who rsvp "yes"!

There's nothing better than feeling good and having fun! We invite you to stay "connected" by receiving our e-mails (which will include our "Good Vibrations" tips and news). To be able to do so, go to your account, and under "Your Groups", each one has an "Edit email settings". Set your preferences there. Hope to hear from you!

Eagerly looking forward to co-creating with you!

Ann and Mark

Note: So our Jewish friends can participate, we've changed our usual meeting day and time just for this month . Please note that we're meeting on Thursday, the 22nd at 7:15 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Learn how you create inner drama and emotional upsets, and how to change that
